member.name: T:MSGraph.Core.AzureAccessToken
member.summary: Token used to authenticate against azure with

member.name: F:MSGraph.Core.AzureAccessToken.TokenType
member.summary: The type of token. Generally, only when the token is of type "Bearer" is a valid connection established.

member.name: F:MSGraph.Core.AzureAccessToken.Resource
member.summary: The service uri where to connect

member.summary: The service uri where to connect

member.name: F:MSGraph.Core.AzureAccessToken.Scope
member.summary: The permission scopes contained on the token

member.summary: Until when the token is valid (utc)

member.name: F:MSGraph.Core.AzureAccessToken.ValidFromUtc
member.summary: Since when the token is valid (utc)

member.name: F:MSGraph.Core.AzureAccessToken.ValidUntil
member.summary: Until when the token is valid

member.name: F:MSGraph.Core.AzureAccessToken.ValidFrom
member.summary: Since when the token is valid

member.name: F:MSGraph.Core.AzureAccessToken.AccessToken
member.summary: The actual access token

member.name: F:MSGraph.Core.AzureAccessToken.RefreshToken
member.summary: The token used to refresh the access token. Refreshing a token will extends its maximum use time.

member.name: F:MSGraph.Core.AzureAccessToken.IDToken
member.summary: The Identity Token

member.name: F:MSGraph.Core.AzureAccessToken.Credential
member.summary: The credentials used to authenticate. Used for unattended connections

member.name: F:MSGraph.Core.AzureAccessToken.ClientId
member.summary: The client ID used to connect

member.name: P:MSGraph.Core.AzureAccessToken.IsValid
member.summary: Whether the token is valid for connections

member.summary: Informationen from JWT access token

member.summary: Token informationen from a JWT access token

member.summary: The type of token. Generally, only when the token is of type "Bearer" is a valid connection established.

member.summary: The type of token. Generally, only when the token is of type "Bearer" is a valid connection established.
